
{{Server client function}}
This function allows restoring of a changed sky gradient as a result of [[/setSkyGradient.md|setSkyGradient]].

==Syntax==
<syntaxhighlight lang="lua">
bool resetSkyGradient()
</syntaxhighlight>

===Returns===
Returns ''true'' if sky color was reset correctly, ''false'' otherwise.

==Example==
This example reset the sky gradient.
<syntaxhighlight lang="lua">
addCommandHandler("resetsky",
  function()
    resetSkyGradient()
  end
)
</syntaxhighlight>
